name: Techwars Global Conflict - Dominion Prosperity Legacy
name_original: Techwars Global Conflict - Dominion Prosperity Legacy
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will give you exclusive premium skins of Dominion company.

This Bundle includes:

- Fisher Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Jupiter Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Steelfield Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Wolfram Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Techwars Global Conflict - The Game
